In each [data package](/docs/design/implementation/outputs.qmd) are [data resources](/docs/design/implementation/outputs.qmd),
which contain a conceptually standalone set of data. This page shows
you how to create and manage data resources inside a data package using Sprout.
We assume that a data package has already been [created](packages.qmd).
